name: Nike Twitter Scanning Sneaker Bot
description:
Our Nike Store Bot w/ Twitter Scanner will greatly increase your chances of being able to purchase limited sneakers from the online Nike Store. 
-Updated to Nike's new site policy.
-Bot will be emailed to you with FULL installation instructions. 
-Works in seconds! 
-The Twitter Scanner will allow you to have fast access to the sneaker's link once Nike posts it on their twitter profile. 
-Don't pay $100.00+ for the same tool!

name: UNLIMITED NIKE STORE SNEAKER BOT W/ TWITTER SCANNER
description:
Must have google chrome , new twitter that only follows NikeStore just click the link when the app puts the tweet on the screen

Clicks the link for you

Compatible with mac and windows

(Please don't ask if this is like other bots because I do not know I have never used any other)

(It is not 100% guaranteed to get you the shoes no bots are it just gives you a better chance)

It is 100% guaranteed for the Bot to work!!
